short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the real creation date of the course instead of the date of the last update which is missleading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows the real creation date of any course instead of the last updated date. This helps course shoppers to decide whether or not the course is the right fit to their needs.
